plot: The successful undercover agent Victor Cooper is assigned for his ninth mission: to find how the loadings of drug is being brought to Miami. He suspects that the drug is coming through the air and joins a team of sky diving, under the leadership of Red Line, a fanatic and considered the athlete number one in this sport in the world. Due to his profile of winner, Vic gets involved with the group and he &"disconnects&" from his position of infiltrated agent, &"connecting&" with the team.   Written by  Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
title: Cutaway
